import React, { useState } from "react"; const foodDataInitial = { siparisNotu: "", boyut: "", Pepperoni: false, sucuk: false, domates: false, }; export default function SiparisForm() { const [foodData, setFoodData] = useState(foodDataInitial); const inputChangeHandler = (event) => { let { value, name, checked, type } = event.target; setFoodData({ ...foodData, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, }); }; console.log(foodData); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newMember = { ...formData, ["img"]: "https://picsum.photos/200/300", ["id"]: members[members.length - 1].id + 1, }; setMembers([...members, newMember]); setFormData(formDataInitial); history.push("/"); }; return (
